pop_up: You have One Upcoming Item Today!
shortcut_tip: The shortcut key to set new alarm
HUD_key_tip: shortcut key to switch task HUD
HUD_update_Key_tip: shortcut key to refresh task HUD. Note: after refreshing, previously finished tasks will reappear
HUD_hide_tip: if true, HUD will always be hidden
replace_tip: If true, replace the vanilla Calendar with Agenda
autoDelete_tip: If true, the agenda will be auto-deleted when the day passed
sync_tip: If true, your agenda will be synced with your host's instead of having your own one. You will NOT lost your original data if you synce with the host. (Tips: If you encountered a bug, sync with host may fix it)
show_birthday_tip: Whether or not to show birthdays on Agenda
show_festival_tip: Whether or not to show festivals on Agenda
show_passive_festival_tip: Whether or not to show passive festivals like night market on Agenda
show_mini_festival_tip: Whether or not to show mini festivals like Trout Derby on Agenda
ignore_condition_tip: If true, the festivals will always be displayed regardless of its condition
warning: WARNING: Your current trigger is incomplete. It will not function if you save it. Do you want to save it?
unsupported: WARNING: Current trigger contains unsupported feature. It will not function if you save it. Do you want to save it?
time_triggered_daily: It seems that you mentioned this time in today's agenda
time_triggered_special: It seems that you mentioned this time in "{{title}}"
